00056       // Play a sound immediately, and release when done unless you
00057       // keep the returned SoundPtr.
00058       SoundPtr play(Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr sound)
00059       {
00060         SoundPtr snd = load(sound);
00061         snd->play();
00062         return snd;
00063       }
00064 
00065       SoundPtr play(const std::string &sound)
00066       {
00067         SoundPtr snd = load(sound);
00068         snd->play();
00069         return snd;
00070       }
00071 
00072       // Ditto for 3D sounds
00073       SoundPtr play3D(Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr sound, float x, float y, float z)
00074       {
00075         SoundPtr snd = load(sound);
00076         snd->setPos(x,y,z);
00077         snd->play();
00078         return snd;
00079       }
00080 
00081       SoundPtr play3D(const std::string &sound, float x, float y, float z)
00082       {
